name: introduction_purpose
Context: This session has the purpose to monitor activity, evaluate your current physical activity plan, make modifications and update goals. It will take approximately 10 to 15 minutes.

name: health_status_symptoms
Question: Have you experienced chest pains, difficulty breathing, or tingling in your hands or feet since the last contact?

name: health_status_during_activity
Question: If so, were these symptoms during physical activity?

name: assessment_progress
Question: Whatâ€™s your progress on your planned workouts regarding frequency, intensity, time, and type?

name: assessment_motivation
Question: What is your motivation or intention to become more active?

name: assessment_tracking
Question: Did you track your physical activity using a wearable?

name: assessment_strength_flexibility
Question: Have you been doing any strengthening exercises (e.g., weights, resistance bands, bodyweight work) or flexibility routines (e.g., stretching, yoga)?
